scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identifiable by his mitre and crozier, stands in a richly decorated interior. He wears a blue cope with gold trim over a grey tunic and white alb. His right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing, with two fingers extended. The background features a red tapestry with gold ornamentation and a decorative frieze at the bottom, suggesting an ecclesiastical or noble setting. The floor is depicted with a green patterned carpet.
